summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6231 for the improvement of Riviera Place Northeast from the production west of the south line of Lot 19, Block 4, Riviera Beach Addition Division No. 3, to the production east of East 125th Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 89374, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
